FuncDef:
The mp statistics fragment-mode enable command configures the fragment statistical mode for all MP-group interfaces and global MP-group interfaces.
The undo mp statistics fragment-mode enable command restores the default statistical mode for all MP-group interfaces and global MP-group interfaces.
By default, the non-fragment statistical mode is used for all MP-group interfaces and global MP-group interfaces.
Examples: Warning: This command will clear statistics of all MP-Group interfaces. Continue?
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
To collect statistics about fragmented packets, run the mp statistics fragment-mode enable command to configure the fragment statistical mode for all MP-group interfaces and global MP-group interfaces.
After the command is run, statistics about packets before being resembled are collected on the uplink, and statistics about packets after being fragmented are collected on the downlink. In non-fragment statistical mode, statistics about packets after being resembled are collected on the uplink, and statistics about packets before being fragmented are collected on the downlink.
